comments:
details:
NPE thrown out when call a stored procedure which name has blank

steps to reproduce:
1. new a sqlserver data set
2. call stored  procedure which name has blank, say "call [stored procedure]
(?)"
3. click on Preview

actual result:
NullPointer exception thrown out

expected result:
N NPE thrown out
